original_title: Giulio Cesare il conquistatore delle Gallie
overview: In 54 B.C. Julius Caesar seeks to solidify his position in Rome by putting down a rebellion in Gaul led by a tribal chieftain named Vercingetorix. Vercingetorix has rallied many tribes to his cause, including one led by the beautiful Queen Asterid and others who'd once pledged allegiance to Rome.
tagline: Julius Caesar leads the Roman army to battle against rebels in Gaul.
title: Caesar The Conqueror
